Deployment

So, how does Streamlyne work? We take all the raw, unstructured, user generated data from three separate silos: Asset Management Systems (IBM, SAP, Oracle, OpenText); Distributed Control Systems (Invensys, Honeywell, Siemens) Operator user generated information/input We then take this complex data and run it through Streamlyne’s Custom Analytics Platform and generate simple and user-friendly graphic images that display new trends and analytics for operators and managers. VP’s and Manager Capabilities Now VP’s and managers can view all system and user generated information - for one or multi-site plants. Operator Capabilities Operators now have a user-friendly iOS mobile application so they can view and input real-time asset information right at their fingertips.


API/Custom Integration

We can connect to all major DCS and Asset Management System API’s. Distributed Control Systems (sensors) We can connect with: Invensys Honeywell Siemens ABB Asset Management Systems We can connect with: IBM Maximo SAP Oracle OpenText
